ResumeParserData.Experience: HSBC Bank Head of Compliance  Manchester, UK  2018 - Present  Leading the compliance team, responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive compliance programs. Conducting regular risk assessments and ensuring the bank adheres to all regulatory requirements.  Key Responsibilities :   Leading a team of compliance officers, providing strategic direction and support.  Developing and updating compliance policies and procedures.  Conducting regular compliance audits and risk assessments to identify and mitigate potential risks.  Ensuring compliance with AML, GDPR, and other regulatory requirements.  Collaborating with senior management to integrate compliance into the bank's strategic planning.  Preparing and presenting compliance reports to the board of directors.  Investigating and resolving compliance issues and breaches.  Barclays Bank Senior Compliance Manager  Manchester, UK  2014 - 2018  Managed the compliance function, ensuring the bank's operations were in line with regulatory requirements. Conducted risk assessments, developed compliance programs, and provided training to staff.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducted comprehensive risk assessments and compliance audits.  Developed and implemented compliance policies and procedures.  Provided training and support to staff on compliance-related matters.  Monitored regulatory changes and ensured the bank's compliance programs were updated accordingly.  Investigated compliance issues and reported findings to senior management.  Collaborated with various departments to ensure a cohesive approach to compliance.  Lloyds Banking Group Compliance Officer  Manchester, UK  2010 - 2014  Supported the compliance team in monitoring and enforcing compliance with regulatory requirements. Conducted due diligence, reviewed transactions, and assisted in developing compliance programs.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients.  Monitored transactions for suspicious activities and potential compliance breaches.  Assisted in developing and implementing compliance policies and procedures.  Provided support and training to staff on compliance-related issues.  Prepared compliance reports and documentation for senior management.  Ensured compliance with AML and other regulatory requirements.

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Leading the compliance team, responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive compliance programs. Conducting regular risk assessments and ensuring the bank adheres to all regulatory requirements. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Leading a team of compliance officers, providing strategic direction and support. 
 Developing and updating compliance policies and procedures. 
 Conducting regular compliance audits and risk assessments to identify and mitigate potential risks. 
 Ensuring compliance with AML, GDPR, and other regulatory requirements. 
 Collaborating with senior management to integrate compliance into the bank's strategic planning. 
 Preparing and presenting compliance reports to the board of directors. 
 Investigating and resolving compliance issues and breaches.

JobProfile.Title: Senior Compliance Manager
JobProfile.Alias: senior level compliance manager, compliance sr. manager, sr compliance manager, sr. compliance manager, compliance senior manager, senior manager of compliance, senior compliance team mgr, senior compliance supervisor, senior compliance mgr, senior compliance head, senior compliance mngr, senior compliance team manager, senior manager compliance, senior-compliance- manager, snr compliance manager

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Managed the compliance function, ensuring the bank's operations were in line with regulatory requirements. Conducted risk assessments, developed compliance programs, and provided training to staff. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducted comprehensive risk assessments and compliance audits. 
 Developed and implemented compliance policies and procedures. 
 Provided training and support to staff on compliance-related matters. 
 Monitored regulatory changes and ensured the bank's compliance programs were updated accordingly. 
 Investigated compliance issues and reported findings to senior management. 
 Collaborated with various departments to ensure a cohesive approach to compliance.

JobProfile.Title: Compliance Officer
JobProfile.Alias: agent compliance reviewer, regulatory compliance inspector, compliance and protection officer, compliance and control rep, branch safety and compliance inspector, officer of compliance, compliance services officer, compliance rep, regional compliance officer, officer compliance, compliance representative, bilingual compliance officer, compliance staff, compliance oversight officer, compliance and inspection officer, operations compliance officer

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Supported the compliance team in monitoring and enforcing compliance with regulatory requirements. Conducted due diligence, reviewed transactions, and assisted in developing compliance programs. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients. 
 Monitored transactions for suspicious activities and potential compliance breaches. 
 Assisted in developing and implementing compliance policies and procedures. 
 Provided support and training to staff on compliance-related issues. 
 Prepared compliance reports and documentation for senior management. 
 Ensured compliance with AML and other regulatory requirements.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Highly skilled and dedicated Head of Compliance with 10 years of experience in the banking sector. Expert in developing compliance programs, conducting risk assessments, and ensuring adherence to regulatory requirements. Known for exceptional leadership skills, strategic thinking, and the ability to foster a culture of compliance within organizations.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Sarah has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Compliance Officers. 'The candidate has a total experience of 10 Years and has been currently working for HSBC Bank Head of Compliance for the last 6.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Currently, Sarah holds a Mid Management Level position, as Senior Compliance Manager at Barclays Bank. from 01/01/2014 to 31/12/2018. The candidate has a total experience of 5.0 years in this company.

Sarah Johnson
Contact Information : 
Address : 21 Cedar Lane, Manchester, M4 3AD, England
Email : sarah.johnson@email.com

Professional Summary : 
Highly skilled and dedicated Head of Compliance with 10 years of experience in the banking sector. Expert in developing compliance programs, conducting risk assessments, and ensuring adherence to regulatory requirements. Known for exceptional leadership skills, strategic thinking, and the ability to foster a culture of compliance within organizations.

Education : 
University of Manchester (Russell Group) 
MSc Financial Regulation and Compliance, Distinction
Graduated : 2013
University of Edinburgh (Russell Group) 
BSc Economics and Business, First Class Honours
Graduated : 2010

Professional Experience : 
HSBC Bank Head of Compliance
Manchester, UK
2018 - Present
Leading the compliance team, responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive compliance programs. Conducting regular risk assessments and ensuring the bank adheres to all regulatory requirements.
Key Responsibilities : 
Leading a team of compliance officers, providing strategic direction and support.
Developing and updating compliance policies and procedures.
Conducting regular compliance audits and risk assessments to identify and mitigate potential risks.
Ensuring compliance with AML, GDPR, and other regulatory requirements.
Collaborating with senior management to integrate compliance into the bank's strategic planning.
Preparing and presenting compliance reports to the board of directors.
Investigating and resolving compliance issues and breaches.
Barclays Bank Senior Compliance Manager
Manchester, UK
2014 - 2018
Managed the compliance function, ensuring the bank's operations were in line with regulatory requirements. Conducted risk assessments, developed compliance programs, and provided training to staff.
Key Responsibilities : 
Conducted comprehensive risk assessments and compliance audits.
Developed and implemented compliance policies and procedures.
Provided training and support to staff on compliance-related matters.
Monitored regulatory changes and ensured the bank's compliance programs were updated accordingly.
Investigated compliance issues and reported findings to senior management.
Collaborated with various departments to ensure a cohesive approach to compliance.
Lloyds Banking Group Compliance Officer
Manchester, UK
2010 - 2014
Supported the compliance team in monitoring and enforcing compliance with regulatory requirements. Conducted due diligence, reviewed transactions, and assisted in developing compliance programs.
Key Responsibilities : 
Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients.
Monitored transactions for suspicious activities and potential compliance breaches.
Assisted in developing and implementing compliance policies and procedures.
Provided support and training to staff on compliance-related issues.
Prepared compliance reports and documentation for senior management.
Ensured compliance with AML and other regulatory requirements.

Skills : 
Regulatory Compliance : Extensive knowledge of regulatory requirements and best practices in the banking sector.
Risk Assessment : Proficient in conducting risk assessments and developing risk mitigation strategies.
Policy Development : Skilled in developing and implementing compliance policies and procedures.
Team Leadership : Strong leadership skills with experience in managing and mentoring compliance teams.
Training and Development : Experienced in providing compliance training and support to staff.
Strategic Thinking : Ability to integrate compliance into the bank's strategic planning.
Analytical Skills : Strong analytical abilities with a keen eye for detail.
Communication : Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present complex information clearly.

Certifications : 
Certified Regulatory Compliance Manager (CRCM) 
International Diploma in Financial Crime Prevention (ICA) 
Certified Anti-Money Laundering Specialist (CAMS) 
Certificate in Risk Management (CIRM)
